short_description: OPTIMAL 3-WAY BUFFER - Prepping your natural nails for acrylic, polish, gel, or dip powder is easy and quick with Maryton nail buffer blocks! Durable, washable and hold up well, our yellow finishing blocks set is a must-have in your nail tool box.

PREMIUM SALON QUALITY - Maryton Nail buffer kits are designed for use in leading salons and spas around the world. These ultra fine buffers are made with premium abrasive material that will not scratch or damage natural nails.
FINE GRIT BUFFER - #240 grit fine nail buffer is ideal for prepping the natural nail for nail application or a smoother finish on poly nail extension gel or after the use of coarser grit buffers.

AT HOME MANICURES - These buffers are the perfect nail accessories that you needed to care for your nails at home. Ideal for final touches on poly nail extension gel and natural nails. Make your polish or press on nails last up longer.
MORE USAGES - These fine grit buffers are great not just for buffing and smoothing nails but also great for any art projects that require fine sanding.
